title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. XI, pt. 262 - Legal Services Insurance
content:

§ 262.0 - Preamble

§ 262.2 - Applicability; general requirements
§ 262.3 - Coverage in an administrative proceeding or involving a non-pecuniary remedy or relief
§ 262.4 - Permitted defense-only coverages involving claims of legal liability
§ 262.5 - Defense of criminal proceedings
§ 262.6 - Directors and officers insurance limitations
§ 262.7 - Coverage trigger
§ 262.8 - Policy limits

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. XI, pt. 262

Statutory authority: Insurance Law, §§ 201, 301, 1113[a] [29], 1116;arts. 23, 63; L. 1998, ch. 65

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
